body:
Hello :D

I want to congratulate Pelpelajax Princezz_Dubstep ,Straightened, Mango_ , and Goliathh on their recent promotions to Senior Moderators. I am sure you will do good! 

Congratulations Glitchy1 on getting mod!!!!

Good luck!

-Electra

title: Congratulations.

replies.body: Pelpelajax I've known you for a while, sadly I became quite rude when I joined Avicus and I think I gave a bad expression. But we're cool now I think :) Congrats buddy!
replies.body_tagged: Pelpelajax I've known you for a while, sadly I became quite rude when I joined Avicus and I think I gave a bad expression. But we're cool now I think :) Congrats buddy!

replies.body: Congratulations, Pel, Michael, Mango, Goliathh, and Dubby! :)

replies.body: Congrats All new Sr Mods good luck !
replies.body_tagged: Congrats All new Sr Mods good luck !

replies.body: Excuse me, didn't see more are promoted. Congratulations to Goliathh and Mango_ for their promotions. Thanks to the staff member that edited my post <3

replies.body: Congrats guys I am sure that you will do great!! :]

replies.body: Congrats to the newly promoted Sr. Staff members! Well deserved :)

replies.body: Congratulations to all newly promoted Sr Staff members, and of course, a returning member of the Avicus Network staff team, Glitchy1!

replies.body: THE GLITCH IS BACK!! lol jk, but really welcome back glitchy! :]

replies.body: If we congratulate everyone, so lets congratulate Peacheh on his promotion to Administrator, to all the Junior Moderators to the promotions to Moderators, and I'm gald to see glitchy as a staff member again! Congratulations everyone! :D
